title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 05
author: Various
snippet: Before noon, the Marshal, SirJohn Carey, at the head of the garrison, composed of horse and foot,marched out of the town towards Lamberton, firing _feu-d'-joies_ as theywent, while the cannon still pealed and the people shouted.
